Item ID1759

A ball of wool is used in the Crafting skill. It is made by using a spinning wheel.

Tip: The shop in Neitiznot has the largest stock of any store with a bank in the same building. After Monkey Madness II the crafting shop on Marim is a close spot to a bank but not faster.

Uses[edit | edit source]

  • Create jewellery.
  • Create strips of cloth using a loom.
  • Final ingredient in making dynamite.
  • Quests, such as Sheep Shearer requiring 20 balls of wool and Monkey Madness I requiring 1 ball of wool.
  • Trade four balls of wool to Ned in Draynor Village for rope.
  • Use on a kitten for increased attention duration.

Date Changes
4 October 2005 –
7 February 2006

The item's examine was changed from "Spun from sheeps wool."[sic] to "Spun from sheeps' wool."

4-18 April 2005

The item was graphically updated.
